title: Inventory Check
text: Check all stock - coffee beans, baked goods, supplies. Prepare restock order to submit on Thursday.

title: Seasonal Menu Launch
text: Prepare for December seasonal menu launch. Touch base with employees to review any recipes. Update store-front menu.

title: Employee Training
text: Check in with managers to plan any necessary trainings. Review customer service best practices to prepare for holiday season.

title: Hiring Holiday Employees
text: Begin process of hiring part-time holiday employees to accommodate holiday workload. Create job postings online and at storefront. Plan to conduct interviews next week.

title: Marketing Campaign
text: Plan to launch social media marketing campaign for holiday season, focusing on the seasonal menu.
